duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively manage and coordinate complex calendars and travel arrangements for executives and their teams.
Create and submit accurate expense reports and monitor executive email communications.
Coordinate with other departments for day-to-day administrative and operational tasks.
Build relationships with other Executive Assistants in the organization and support department initiatives.
Provide assistance with various miscellaneous projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree preferred and 4+ years of demonstrated Executive Assistant experience.
